description.original: Automatically organizes files into folders based on their extensions or tags
description.translation: Automatically organizes files into folders based on their extensions or tags

dict.Notice(`update extension-to-folder mappi: Notice(`更新扩展程序到文件夹的映射`)
dict.Notice(`update tag-to-folder mapping.`): Notice(`更新标签到文件夹的映射。`)
dict.Notice(`Folder for .${extension} files u: Notice(`用于.${extension} 文件的文件夹已更新至： ${value}`)
dict.Notice(`Folder for ${tag} files updated: Notice(`用于 ${tag} 文件的文件夹已更新至：${value}`)
dict..log(\"No folder mapping defined. Skippi: .log("未定义文件夹映射。跳过文件整理操作。")
dict..log(`No suitable folder mapping found f: .log(`未找到适合该文件的文件夹映射：${file.name}`)
dict..error(`Failed to move file ${file.name}: .error(`按标签移动文件 ${file.name} 失败`, err)
.error(`根据扩展名移动文件 ${file.name} 失败:`, err)
dict.text: \"Extension-to-Folder Mapping\": text: "扩展名到文件夹的映射"
dict..setDesc(\"Decide which mapping takes pr: .setDesc("当两种映射都启用时，确定哪种映射优先。")
dict..setDesc(\"Enable or disable extension-t: .setDesc("启用或禁用扩展程序到文件夹的映射。")
dict..setDesc(\"Add a new extension and targe: .setDesc("添加一个新的扩展名和目标文件夹")
dict..setDesc(\"Scan the extension in the fil: .setDesc("扫描文件中的扩展名，并自动将扩展名映射到文件夹。")
dict..setDesc(\"Indicate what folder is exclu: .setDesc("指出哪个文件夹被排除在自动获取扩展名映射之外。")
dict..setDesc(\"This folder is excluded when: .setDesc("当点击获取扩展按钮时，此文件夹被排除在外。")
dict..setDesc(\"Enable or disable tag-to-fold: .setDesc("启用或禁用标签到文件夹的映射。")
dict..setDesc(\"Add a new tag and target fold: .setDesc("添加一个新标签和目标文件夹")
dict..setDesc(\"Scan the tag in the file and: .setDesc("扫描文件中的标签，并自动将标签映射到文件夹。")
dict..setDesc(\"Indicate what folder is exclu: .setDesc("指出哪个文件夹被排除在自动获取标签映射之外。")
dict..setDesc(\"This folder is excluded when: .setDesc("当按下获取标签映射按钮时，此文件夹被排除在外。")
